Short deal description.deal_description: Google LLC has signed a definitive agreement to acquire Mandiant, Inc., a leader in dynamic cyber defense and response, for $23.00 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $5.4 billion. Mandiant will join Google Cloud to enhance its security operations suite, adding over 600 security consultants and 300 intelligence analysts. The acquisition aims to strengthen Google Cloud's capabilities in detecting and responding to cyber threats, providing an end-to-end security operations suite for customers across cloud and on-premise environments.

Short Business description (target compa.short_business_description: Mandiant, Inc. is a leader in dynamic cyber defense and response, specializing in strategic security advisory and incident response services. Founded in 2004, Mandiant's mission is to combat cyber attacks and protect its customers from the latest threats. The company provides real-time and in-depth threat intelligence, and its services include advisory services, threat detection and intelligence, automation and response tools, testing and validation, and managed defense. Mandiant operates as a standalone company after separating from FireEye in 2021.

Main rationale.rationale: Google’s acquisition of Mandiant is driven by the need to enhance its cloud security offerings. Mandiant, a leader in dynamic cyber defense and response, will join Google Cloud to deliver an end-to-end security operations suite with greater capabilities to support customers across their cloud and on-premise environments. This acquisition aims to address the increasing sophistication and severity of cyber attacks, providing real-time and in-depth threat intelligence, and strengthening Google Cloud’s position in the competitive cloud services market against rivals like Microsoft and Amazon.
